opinion.author: isabelle
opinion.post: What sounded strange to me about Colton’s story is that he saw God on his throne and Jesus next to him and the Holy Spirit (blue Figure)????? God,Jesus and the Holy Spirit are one Person in three manifestations!!! I believe that when we get to heaven we will only see Jesus who is God!!!!!.
opinion.title: An Exhibit of the Shroud of Turin at The Royal Church of San Lorenzo
